`,(0,a.jsxDEV)(t.pre,{children:(0,a.jsxDEV)(t.code,{className:"language-js",children:`function solution(A) {\r
  let answer = 0;\r
  const point = [];\r
  for (let i = 0; i < A.length; i++) {\r
    const [start, end] = [i - A[i], i + A[i]];\r
    point.push([start, end]);\r
  }\r
\r
  point.sort((a, b) => a[0] - b[0] || b[1] - a[1]);\r
\r
  for (let i = 0; i < point.length; i++) {\r
    for (let j = i + 1; j < point.length; j++) {\r
      if (point[i][1] < point[j][0]) continue;\r
      answer++;\r
    }\r
  }\r
  return answer;\r
}

`,(0,a.jsxDEV)(t.p,{children:`\uC120\uBD84 \uAD50\uCC28, \uACB9\uCE58\uB294 \uAD6C\uAC04 \uCC3E\uAE30, \uCD5C\uADFC\uC811 \uC810 \uC30D \uCC3E\uAE30 \uB4F1\uC758 \uBB38\uC81C\uC5D0 \uC0AC\uC6A9\uB418\uBA70,\r
\uBCF4\uD1B5 O(n log n)\uC758 \uC2DC\uAC04 \uBCF5\uC7A1\uB3C4\uB97C \uAC00\uC9C4\uB2E4.`},void 0,!1,{fileName:"C:\\Users\\dev\\songhaeun-blog\\posts\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-c0cfc200-f628-4176-a8fe-235e2c05926c.mdx",lineNumber:45,columnNumber:1},this),`
`,(0,a.jsxDEV)(t.h3,{children:"\uB77C\uC778 \uC2A4\uC704\uD551\uC744 \uC0AC\uC6A9\uD574 \uC218\uC815\uD55C \uCF54\uB4DC"},void 0,!1,{fileName:"C:\\Users\\dev\\songhaeun-blog\\posts\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-c0cfc200-f628-4176-a8fe-235e2c05926c.mdx",lineNumber:48,columnNumber:1},this),`
`,(0,a.jsxDEV)(t.pre,{children:(0,a.jsxDEV)(t.code,{className:"language-js",children:`function solution(A) {\r
  let answer = 0;\r
  const point = [];\r
  for (let i = 0; i < A.length; i++) {\r
    const [start, end] = [i - A[i], i + A[i]];\r
    point.push([start, 1]);\r
    point.push([end, -1]);\r
  }\r
\r
  point.sort((a, b) => a[0] - b[0] || b[1] - a[1]);\r
\r
  let active = 0;\r
  let intersections = 0;\r
  for (let i = 0; i < point.length; i++) {\r
    if (point[i][1] === 1) {\r
      intersections += active;\r
    }\r
    if (intersections > 10000000) return -1;\r
    active += point[i][1];\r
  }\r
  return intersections;\r
}
`},void 0,!1,{fileName:"C:\\Users\\dev\\songhaeun-blog\\posts\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-c0cfc200-f628-4176-a8fe-235e2c05926c.mdx",lineNumber:50,columnNumber:1},this)},void 0,!1,{fileName:"C:\\Users\\dev\\songhaeun-blog\\posts\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-c0cfc200-f628-4176-a8fe-235e2c05926c.mdx",lineNumber:50,columnNumber:1},this),`
